00111         class OMEGA_API ApplicationClient: public DynamicObject
00112         {
00113         friend class DisplaySystem;
00114         public:
00115                 ApplicationClient(Application* app);
00116                 virtual ~ApplicationClient(); 
00117 
00118                 virtual void setup() {}
00119                 virtual void initialize();
00120 
00121                 virtual void update(const UpdateContext& context) {}
00122                 virtual void draw(const DrawContext& context) {}
00123                 virtual bool handleEvent(const Event& evt, DrawContext& context) { return false; }
00124                 virtual bool handleEvent(const Event& evt, UpdateContext& context) { return false; }
00125 
00126                 Application* getApplication() { return myApplication; }
00127                 SystemManager*  getSystemManager()  { return SystemManager::instance(); }
00128                 ServiceManager*   getServiceManager()   { return SystemManager::instance()->getServiceManager(); }
00129                 DisplaySystem*  getDisplaySystem() { return SystemManager::instance()->getDisplaySystem(); }
